tags.name: openapi
tags.description: methods that query for OpenAPI specifications

get.description: This endpoint may return multiple job entries since job_id is not a unique key - only the tuple (cluster, job_id, start_time) is unique. If the requested job_id is a component of a heterogeneous job all components are returned.

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted QOSs. False by default.

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted QOSs. False by default.

default.description: Associations not found or unable to delete association
Association not found or unable to delete association
User not found or unable to delete user

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted users. False by default.

default.description: User not found or not able to update user

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted users. False by default.

default.description: Cluster not found or unable to delete cluster
wckey not found or unable to delete wckey

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted accounts. False by default.

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted accounts. False by default.

default.description: Unable to add or update accounts

parameters.name: users
parameters.description: Filter by comma delimited list of user names

parameters.name: submit_time
parameters.description:
Filter by submission time
 Accepted formats:
 HH:MM[:SS] [AM|PM]
MMDD[YY] or MM/DD[/YY] or MM.DD[.YY]
MM/DD[/YY]-HH:MM[:SS]
YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM[:SS]]

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description:
Filter by start time
 Accepted formats:
 HH:MM[:SS] [AM|PM]
MMDD[YY] or MM/DD[/YY] or MM.DD[.YY]
MM/DD[/YY]-HH:MM[:SS]
YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM[:SS]]

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
Filter by end time
 Accepted formats:
 HH:MM[:SS] [AM|PM]
MMDD[YY] or MM/DD[/YY] or MM.DD[.YY]
MM/DD[/YY]-HH:MM[:SS]
YYYY-MM-DD[THH:MM[:SS]]

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of accounts to match

parameters.name: association
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of associations to match

parameters.name: cluster
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of cluster to match

parameters.name: constraints
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of constraints to match

parameters.name: disable_wait_for_result
parameters.description: Disable waiting for result from slurmdbd

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of formats to match

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of groups to match

parameters.name: job_name
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of job names to match

parameters.name: partition
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of partitions to match

parameters.name: qos
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of QOS to match

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of job reasons to match

parameters.name: reservation
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of reservations to match

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of states to match

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of job steps to match

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of used nodes to match

parameters.name: wckey
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of wckeys to match

user.description: Admin level of user, DefaultAccount, DefaultWCKey

grpjobs.description: Max number of jobs the underlying group of associations can run at one time

maxtrespernode.description: Max number of TRES this association can allocate per node

maxwalldurationperjob.description: Longest time this association can run a job

minpriothresh.description: Don't reserve resources for pending jobs unless they have a priority equal to or higher than this

fairshare.description: Number of shares allocated to this association

adminlevel.description: Admin level of user.  Valid levels are None, Operator, and Admin.
